name: Down With The Wall
description:
A southern wall has been rejected several times by most of our leaders in Congress. Not only that, the leader of the nation has again and again lied about not only the false threats the wall is blocking, but also about how it will be funded. After circumventing safeguards that ensure a fair democracy, a facist gets his request to build a racist wall on the south of the country.

Your Job? Knock it Down! Look out for Refugees as well! Give them a signal, and a bus will come and take them to the nearest refugee support center!

Keys

(AD or direction arrows) - Move Player

C or J - Jump

X or K - Swing Hammer

Enter or Return - Pause
